description: A quick, practical guide to Observability for Agent Decisions.

buildup.text: Observability is visibility into decisions: what it saw, what it chose, what tools it called, and what happened.

discovery.text: Log the decision trail: inputs, retrieved sources, tool calls + parameters, outputs, and stop/escalation reasons.

twist.text: Counters tell you that something is wrong. Traces tell you where it went wrong.

climax.text: Include versions in the trace (prompt/policy/tool versions) so you can compare â€œbefore vs afterâ€ when behavior changes.
